original_text: When the men got up to leave, they looked down toward Sodom, and Abraham walked along with them to see them on their way.
korean_text: 그 사람들이 거기서 일어나서 소돔으로 향하고 아브라함은 그들을 전송하러 함께 나가니라

sentences.original_text: When the men got up to leave
and Abraham walked along with them
to see them on their way
